001001 00000 00001 0111111111111111     # addi $r0 $r1
010100 00000 00001 00001 00000 000000   # and $r0 $r1 $r1
000000 00001 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r1
00000000000000000000000000000000

001001 00000 00010 0110101010101010     # addi $r0 $r2
001001 00000 00011 0100110011110000     # addi $r0 $r3
010100 00010 00011 00011 00000 000000   # and $r2 $r3 $r3
000000 00011 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r3
00000000000000000100100010100000

001001 00000 00100 0011001101010101     # addi $r0 $r4
001001 00000 00101 0111000011001100     # addi $r0 $r5
010100 00100 00101 00101 00000 000000   # and $r4 $r5 $r5
000000 00101 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r5
00000000000000000011000001000100

001011 00000 00110 0111000011001010     # lui $r6
001001 00110 00110 0111000011001010     # addi $r6 $r6
001011 00000 00111 0010110011110000     # lui $7
001001 00111 00111 0010110011110000     # addi $r7 $r7
010100 00110 00111 00111 00000 000000   # and $r6 $r7 $r7
000000 00111 000000000000000000000      # asrt $r7
00100000110000000010000011000000

000101 00000 00000 0000000000000000     # halt
